005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.AbstractDefinitionTargetedConstraints;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * A set of constraints targeting a {@link IFieldDefinition} based on a target
015 * Metapath expression.
016 *
017 * @see #getTargetExpression()
018 */
019public class FieldTargetedConstraints
020    extends AbstractDefinitionTargetedConstraints<IFieldDefinition, IValueConstrained> {
021
022  /**
023   * Construct a new set of targeted constraints.
024   *
025   * @param target
026   *          the Metapath expression that can be used to find matching targets
027   * @param constraints
028   *          the constraints to apply to matching targets
029   */
030  public FieldTargetedConstraints(
031      @NonNull String target,
032      @NonNull IValueConstrained constraints) {
033    super(target, constraints);
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  public void target(@NonNull IFieldDefinition definition) {
038    applyTo(definition);
039  }
040}
